identity.mission: Create a visceral, tactile laundry experience that merges physical machinery with digital fluidity. Reject standard SaaS templates.
principles: Fusion: Industrial Machinery x Digital Glass
Content: Data is beautiful, Status is immediate
Zoom: Focus on the machine state
Negative Space: Breathable layouts for touch interaction

primary_font.name: Fredoka One
primary_font.usage: Headings, Machine Numbers, Status States (Kiosk Only)

hero_background.desc: Clean, modern laundry room background for Kiosk Home

KioskMachineCard.style: Glassmorphism card. Large status indicator. 'Fredoka One' for machine number. Ripple effect on click.

PaymentModal.style: Full screen overlay with blur. Central QR code. Large 'Confirm' button.

DashboardStatCard.style: Dark mode, slate-900 bg. Neon accent border on top. Big number.

DashboardChart.style: Recharts responsive container. Dark theme tooltip. Minimal grid lines.

KioskLayout.structure: Mobile-first. 100vh container. Grid layout (Bento) for machines. Bottom navigation bar for 'Help' or 'Language'.

DashboardLayout.structure: Sidebar (collapsible on mobile) + Main Content Area. Top bar with User Profile.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts links for Fredoka One, Manrope, and JetBrains Mono to public/index.html immediately.
2. SETUP THEMES: Configure tailwind.config.js to support the 'dark' class strategy effectively, but use specific color classes for the Kiosk (light) vs Dashboard (dark) separation.
3. GLASSMORPHISM: Create a utility class or component wrapper for the 'Glass' effect to ensure consistency.
4. ANIMATION: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions (Kiosk needs to feel like a native app).
5. MOCK DATA: Create a robust mock data file for machines and transactions since backend might be simulated initially.
6. NOTIFICATIONS: Use 'sonner' for toast notifications (e.g., 'WhatsApp sent!').
7. ICONS: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons (WashingMachine, QrCode, Activity, DollarSign).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Avoid generic centered layouts; use grids.
Create depth with z-index and shadows.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Use named exports for components, default exports for pages.
